text:
Dangerous open-ended `if ... elif` in `masking.unmask.

`if X.ndim == 2:
        unmasked = _unmask_nd(X, mask, order=order)
    elif X.ndim == 1:
        unmasked = _unmask_3d(X, mask, order=order)`
title: Dangerous open-ended `if ... elif` in `masking.unmask (i.e `else` is absent)
clean_text: danger openend xndim 2 unmask unmaskndx mask orderord elif xndim 1 unmask unmask3dx mask orderord

> Dangerous open-ended if ... elif in `masking.unmask.

Indeed. Could you send a pull request that raises a meaningful error in
an else clause.
